kademlia

类 Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • kademlia.Util

  • public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
    Some utility and mathematical function to work with BigInteger numbers and strings.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Util() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.math.BigInteger distance(java.math.BigInteger a, java.math.BigInteger b)
      return the distance between two number wich is defined as (a XOR b)
      static int prefixLen(java.math.BigInteger b1, java.math.BigInteger b2)
      Given two numbers, returns the length of the common prefix, i.e. how many digits (in base 2) have in common from the leftmost side of the number
      static java.lang.String put0(java.math.BigInteger b)
      convert a BigInteger into a String (base 2) and lead all needed non-significative zeroes in order to reach the canonical length of a nodeid

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 方法详细资料

      • prefixLen

        public static final int prefixLen(java.math.BigInteger b1,
                                  java.math.BigInteger b2)
        Given two numbers, returns the length of the common prefix, i.e. how many digits (in base 2) have in common from the leftmost side of the number
        参数:
        b1 - BigInteger
        b2 - BigInteger
        返回:
        int

      • distance

        public static final java.math.BigInteger distance(java.math.BigInteger a,
                                                  java.math.BigInteger b)
        return the distance between two number wich is defined as (a XOR b)
        参数:
        a - BigInteger
        b - BigInteger
        返回:
        BigInteger

      • put0

        public static final java.lang.String put0(java.math.BigInteger b)
        convert a BigInteger into a String (base 2) and lead all needed non-significative zeroes in order to reach the canonical length of a nodeid
        参数:
        b - BigInteger
        返回:
        String
